captions.text: It is amazing that Red Bull has launched the Red Bull Colonnade run here in Jordan, I still can't believe this is happening.
It's been my life long dream to participate in a Red Bull freerunning competition,
especially now since whoever wins will advance to the Red Bull Art of Motion competition in Santorini , Greece. It's very exciting!
Parkour has been a hobby since childhood, I love it, I love the adventure, it feels like I'm flying. So I wanted to participate in the first ever Red Bull event in Jordan and hopefully I'll do well.
Today we are here to put on a nice show for the audience, to show them the art of parkour, which is all about the athletes ability to adapt to their
environment. Today they are not competing with each other, they are competing with the challenge this environment is presenting.
I hope that they continue supporting each other and building the parkour scene as much as they can.

I just won the Red Bull Colonnade run, and will be representing Jordan in Santorini, Greece.. where the world final qualifiers will be taking place. I really hope I'll be able to do well to make it to the world final!

title: Freerunning Competition in Jordan - Red Bull Collonade Run 2013
